text: Badwell Ash is a village and civil parish in Mid Suffolk, Suffolk, England. In 2001 there were 685 people living in Badwell Ash. Badwell Ash has a church called St Mary. Badwell Ash is about 12 miles from Bury St Edmunds and Stowmarket. == References == * GENUKI Category:Villages in Suffolk Category:Civil parishes in Suffolk Category:Mid Suffolk
title: Badwell Ash
